src: 据《中国项目管理二十年发展报告(1999-2019)》称：截止到2019年9月，全国累计PMP®报考人数近60万人次，通过PMP®认证人数约42万人，有效持证人数约30万人, 占全球PMP®持证总量的31.2%。
new_mt: According to the “China Project Management Twenty Years Development Report (1999-2019)”: As of September 2019, the total number of PMP® candidates in China was nearly 600,000, the number of PMP® certified was about 420,000, and the number of valid certificates was about 300,000, accounting for 31.2% of the global PMP® certificate holders.

src: 近10年PMP持证人数逐年递增，这说明越来越多的项目管理者意识到：靠简单照搬以往“老经验”来做事已不可取，瞬息万变的工作环境让我们知道一个要学会，站在科学巨人的肩膀上去探索前行的道路。

src: 然而，考了PMP就能保证项目管理工作畅通无阻了吗？

src: 很多项目管理初学者表示，通过学习PMP/IPMP等相关课程，可以系统性地掌握项目管理的十大领域和五大过程组等相关知识点，但真正进行项目管理工作的时候却还是一头雾水。
new_mt: Many project management beginners say that after learning PMP/IPMP courses, they can systematically master the ten major areas and five major processes of project management, but when they really do project management work, they are still a little confused.

src: 很多项目经理常常反馈以下问题： 项目管理认知不到位，单纯依靠个人经验，空有项目管理理论，不知如何实践； 缺乏系统的项目管理流程制度支撑，工作中无法落地，项目预估不准，把控度灵敏度差，项目一拖再拖； 成员分工不明确、团队中的“老油条”不知如何应对 跨部门协助沟通不顺畅，项目难以推进 ……

src: 据人民银行今年发布的《消费者金融素养调查分析报告》结果显示，全国消费者金融素养指数为66.81，与2019年相比，提高2.04。

src: 总体上，我国居民在金融消费层面上的表现较好，但在金融行为和技能的不同方面体现出较大的差异性，还需要进一步提升基础金融知识水平。

src: 老年人和青少年的金融素养水平相对较低 ， “ 一老一少”仍将是金融教育持续关注的重点对象；尼尔森发布的《中国年轻人负债状况报告》及央视财经发布的《2019-2020中国青年消费报告》显示，年轻一代具有巨大的消费潜力，信用消费成为消费升级重要途径，86.6%的年轻人都在使用信贷产品，近半数人没有债务累积，年轻一代虽然整体呈现理性消费趋势，虽与外界贴上的“过度挥霍”标签大相径庭，但部分年轻人的确存在过度消费、跟风消费行为，并因此产生了过大的财务压力和债务风险，甚至导致社会问题逐渐增加，金融企业应勇于承担社会责任，进行正向引导。

src: 从世界第一所现代意义上的大学诞生起，大学就肩负起不同于其他社会组织的独特使命，对于我国大学来说，兴起于民族危难之秋，其精神更是深受传统文化和时代变迁的影响，倡导“明德济世，修齐治平”的价值理念和“兴学强国”的爱国主义担当。
retrieved_src: 广州市对外贸易经济合作局局长陈明德，向与会人士介绍广州市经济社会最新情况及投资环境。
retrieved_ref: The Director-General of the Bureau of Foreign Trade and Economic Co-operation of Guangzhou Municipality,Mr Chen Mingde,briefed participants about the latest developments and investment environment in Guangzhou.
new_mt: From the birth of the first modern university in the world, the university has assumed a unique mission different from other social organizations. For Chinese universities, it was born in the autumn of national crisis, and its spirit has been deeply influenced by traditional culture and the changes of the times. It advocates the value concept of "Benefiting the World and Cultivating the Nation" and the patriotic mission of "Strengthening the Nation through Education".

src: 当前，高等教育信息化、国际化趋势日益明显，全球范围的教育竞争、科技竞争、人才竞争不断加剧，高等教育事业作为重要的“供给侧 ” ， 其结构性改革正面临前所未有的机遇和挑战。
new_mt: The current trend of informationization and internationalization of higher education is becoming more and more obvious, the global competition of education, technology and talent is constantly intensifying, and the higher education industry as an important "supply side" is facing unprecedented opportunities and challenges in its structural reform.

src: 尤其是《统筹推进世界一流大学和一流学科建设总体方案》的提出，在展示了我国从高等教育大国向高等教育强国迈进的信心和决心的同时，更是对大学发展提出了更高更新的要求。
new_mt: In particular, the proposal to advance the construction of world-class universities and world-class disciplines in the "General Plan for the Coordinated Development of World-Class Universities and World-Class Disciplines" has shown our country's confidence and determination in advancing from a great power in higher education to a strong power in higher education. At the same time, it also puts forward higher and more stringent requirements for university development.

src: 如何在较短时间内努力跻身世界一流行列，在仍有一定差距的基础上加快建成若干所世界一流大学和一批世界一流学科，实现“弯道超车 ” ？
new_mt: How to quickly climb to the world's first-class ranks in a short time, while still having a certain gap, to build a few world-class universities and a batch of world-class disciplines, to achieve "bending the car"?

src: 除了坚定目标自信、路径自信、能力自信，高校还应当充分发挥三种优势：一是后发优势，通过持续引进海外杰出学术人才，学习借鉴世界一流大学的先进经验，实现学术水平和办学质量的显著提升；二是文化优势，继承中华文明在五千年积淀的智慧内涵，弘扬发展优秀传统文化，以此来凝聚力量、塑造品牌、提升形象；三是制度优势，发挥社会主义国家的制度优越性，强化目标驱动，汇集共识合力，优化资源配置，为学校加速赶超世界先进水平提供可持续的坚实保障。

src: 特别要意识到，建设世界一流大学不可能千校一面，各个学校在发挥优势的同时，必须彰显个性和特色。

src: 办学特色既要有共性的中国特色，也要体现各自独特的目标定位、办学传统和资源禀赋。
new_mt: The school’s educational characteristics should have both common Chinese characteristics and unique characteristics of each school.

src: 就浙江大学而言，我们在办学中注重突出三个方面的特色：一是突出创新创业人才培养特色，构建科教融合、校企结合的整合育人环境，形成全链条的创业教育生态系统；二是突出学科交叉会聚特色，推动学科体系的优化调整，营造学科交叉的制度环境，积极培育交叉新兴学科和标志性交叉成果；三是突出办学体系和社会服务特色，开展深度国际交流合作，加快形成泛浙大产学研合作体系。

Third, we emphasize the characteristics of the school and social service. We carry out in-depth international exchanges and cooperation, and accelerate the formation of the Zhejiang University-industry-research cooperation system.

src: 习近平指出，当今世界正经历百年未有之大变局，全球科技创新进入密集活跃期，新一轮科技革命和产业变革对全球经济结构产生了深刻影响。

src: 广西大学生休学创业年限最长可达５年-新华网
new_mt: Guangxi University students can take up to 5 years to study entrepreneurship - Xinhua Net

src: 新华社南宁５月１９日专电（记者张莺）记者近日从广西壮族自治区教育厅获悉，今后广西各高校将实施弹性学制，放宽大学生休学年限，在校生休学创业的年限在原有学制基础上可延长２至５年，休学创业时间可视为实践教育时间。
new_mt: Xinhua News Agency, Nanning, May 19 (reporter Zhao Li) reporter recently from the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region Education Department learned that in the future, Guangxi universities will implement flexible study, relax the university students' vacation year limit, and the vacation period for students to start a business can be extended by 2 to 5 years, and the vacation period for students to start a business can be seen as practical education time.

src: 为促进大学生创业创新能力提升，广西教育、人社等部门合力搭建创业平台，建设更多大学生校外实践教学基地、大学科技园、大学生创业园、创业孵化基地等，给大学生创业提供外在保障。
new_mt: To promote the improvement of the innovation and entrepreneurship ability of university students, the education, human resources and other departments of Guangxi have jointly built an entrepreneurship platform, and have built more university student entrepreneurship bases outside the school, such as university science and technology parks, university student entrepreneurship parks, entrepreneurship incubation bases, etc., to provide external protection for university student entrepreneurship.

src: 根据要求，到２０２０年，各高校创新创业实践基地面积，本科学校要达到３０００平方米以上，高职学校要达到２０００平方米以上。
retrieved_src: 晋升选拔工作的指导原则，是在合资格的公务员中，甄选最适合及最优秀的人选，填补较高职级的空缺，并执行该较高职级的职责和任务。
retrieved_ref: The guiding principle of a promotion exercise is to select the most suitable and meritorious candidate from among eligible civil servants to fill vacancy at a higher rank and to undertake the duties and to discharge the responsibilities of that higher rank.
new_mt: By 2020, the area of each university innovation and entrepreneurship practice base should reach 3,000 square meters for undergraduate schools and 2,000 square meters for vocational schools.

src: 政府鼓励高校设立创新创业学分，优先支持在创新创业实践中表现优异的学生转专业。
new_mt: The government encourages universities to establish innovation and entrepreneurship credits, and gives priority to supporting students who perform well in innovation and entrepreneurship practice.

src: 高校教师每两年要至少有两个月到行业企业挂职锻炼，以此提高教师创新创业教育的意识和能力。
new_mt: Teachers in colleges and universities should have at least two months of internship in the industry every two years to enhance their awareness and ability to innovate and entrepreneurship education.

src: 自治区教育厅要求广西各高校深入实施大学生创新创业训练计划，力争使每一名大学生在校期间都参与一项创新创业训练计划。
new_mt: The Department of Education of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region requires all universities in Guangxi to deeply implement the plan of training college students in innovation and entrepreneurship, and strive to make every college student participate in an innovation and entrepreneurship training program during their college life.

src: 高校要积极组织学生参加各级各类创新创业竞赛，并给予经费支持。
new_mt: The school should actively organize students to participate in various innovation and entrepreneurship competitions at all levels, and provide financial support.

src: 欧阳瑜致辞时首先向获颁发荣誉博士学位的七位杰出人士，表示热烈的祝贺并致以崇高的敬意，他们分别在不同的领域取得非凡的成就，为国家的发展和世界的进步作出了卓越的贡献；同时，欧阳瑜向毕业生和家长表达最真挚的祝福，也向大学爱岗敬业、学术精湛的教职员团队致以由衷的敬意。

src: 美亚裔团体投诉耶鲁等3所常春藤名校招生歧视-新华网

src: 新华社华盛顿５月２３日电（记者徐剑梅）美国１３０多个亚裔团体２３日向美国教育部和司法部提交申诉，抗议３所常春藤名校 — — 耶鲁大学、布朗大学和达特茅斯学院在招生过程中歧视亚裔申请学生。
retrieved_src: 威斯康星—麦迪逊大学的科学家说，他们的这项新技术离实用还有较远的距离。
retrieved_ref: Scientists from University of Wisconsin-Madison say that their new technology is still rather far from practicability.
new_mt: Xinhua Washington, May 23 (Reporter Xu Jianmei) More than 130 Asian American groups in the United States submitted a petition to the U.S. Department of Education and the Justice Department on May 23 to protest against the discrimination against Asian American applicants in the admission process of three Ivy League universities - Yale University, Brown University and Dartmouth College.

src: 牵头发起申诉的亚裔教育联盟当天在华盛顿召开新闻发布会。
new_mt: The Asian American Education League, which initiated the lawsuit, held a press conference in Washington on the day of the lawsuit.

src: 该团体主席赵宇空在发布会上说，过去１０年里，符合美国名校录取条件的亚裔申请人数量成倍增长，但在这３所美国名校中，亚裔所占比例基本维持在同一水平。
new_mt: The president of the organization Zhao Yuchun said at the press conference that in the past ten years, the number of Asian applicants who meet the admission criteria of American universities has increased by ten times, but in these three American universities, the proportion of Asians has basically remained at the same level.

src: 许多研究表明，这些高校在所谓“综合考量”的招生过程中 ， “ 长期持续性以及系统化地歧视亚裔申请学生 ” 。
new_mt: Many studies have shown that these universities in the so-called "comprehensive consideration" of the admission process, "long-term and systematic discrimination against Asian applicants"

src: 赵宇空介绍说，２０１４年桑德斯等学者的研究显示，在这３所高校里，相对申请者人数，亚裔在所有族裔中录取率最低。
retrieved_src: 他的棺木摆在特制的白色大理石陵寝里。
retrieved_ref: His coffin was placed in a special white marble cemetery.
new_mt: Zhao Yuchun introduced that in 2014, Sanders and other scholars found that among the three universities, the acceptance rate of Asian applicants was the lowest among all ethnic groups.

src: 美国教育部的数据也显示，在所有常春藤盟校中，布朗大学和达特茅斯学院对亚裔学生的录取比例最低，耶鲁大学和布朗大学对亚裔申请学生实施了事实上的种族配额达２０年以上。
new_mt: Data from the U.S. Department of Education also shows that among all Ivy League schools, Brown University and Dartmouth College have the lowest admission rates for Asian students, while Yale University and Brown University have been practicing de facto racial quotas for more than 20 years.

src: 赵宇空告诉新华社记者，他们期望提交申诉后，美国教育部、司法部能够展开调查，并在认定事实后采取措施阻止这些高校继续在招生中歧视亚裔。
new_mt: Zhao Yuchen told the reporter of Xinhua News Agency that they hope to submit an appeal after the investigation, and the US Department of Education and the Department of Justice can carry out an investigation and determine the facts after the investigation, and take measures to stop these universities from continuing to discriminate against Asian students in the admission process.

src: 他们也期望被投诉高校能够主动重视这一问题，改变对亚裔的招生政策。
new_mt: They also hope that the universities can actively take this issue into consideration, and change the admission policy for Asian students.

src: 目前，被投诉的３所高校尚未作出回应。
new_mt: As of now, the three schools have not responded to the complaints.

src: 亚裔教育联盟成立于２０１５年，当时曾投诉哈佛大学招生歧视，但美国教育部以程序理由未予受理。
new_mt: The Asian American Education Alliance was founded in 2015, when it filed a complaint with the U.S. Department of Education against Harvard University for discriminating against Asian-American applicants. However, the U.S. Department of Education rejected the complaint on procedural grounds.

src: 21日、22日两日，北京市初中入学特长生考查工作由各区教委统一组织实施。
new_mt: On 21st and 22nd, the entrance examination for special talents in middle schools in Beijing will be held unifiedly organized by each district education committee.

src: 今年，北京各区均压缩了特长生招生比例，特长生竞争更为激烈。
new_mt: This year, the enrollment rate of specialized talents in Beijing has been reduced, and the competition is more intense.

src: 以东城区为例，今年该区小学升初中特长生入学比例总体不超过全区招生计划数的5 % ， 计划招生人数为380人，到校比例不超过学校招生计划数的10 % 。
new_mt: In the East District, the proportion of primary school students who are admitted to junior high school with special talents is generally not higher than 5% of the total number of students admitted to junior high school in the district. The planned number of students admitted to junior high school is 380, and the admission rate is not higher than 10% of the planned number of students.

src: 凡具有体育、艺术、科技特长且在网上报名的学生均有资格参加特长生招生考查。

retrieved_ref: However,the Red Cross Association said the death toll was likely to rise since up to 8,000 houses were destroyed or seriously damaged and 12 public buildings had been leveled to the ground.

src: 为方便学生就近参加考查，东城区延续去年的考查安排方式，在每个学区分别设置1~2个考查地点，共13个考查地点。
new_mt: To facilitate students to take the examination nearby, the East District continues the arrangement of last year, setting up 1~2 examination sites in each school district, a total of 13 examination sites.

src: 考点均按考区划分考场，以小时为单位划分时段，考查当天学生将按时段进入考点在不同考区考场内进行考查。

src: 波黑奥委会主席：坚信中国有能力在特殊时期办好冬奥盛会-新华网
new_mt: IOC President: Confident China can host Winter Olympics in special period - Xinhua

src: 新华社萨拉热窝12月11日电 波黑奥委会主席克韦西奇近日表示，波方十分期待北京冬奥会，坚信中国有能力在特殊时期办好冬奥盛会。
new_mt: Xinhua, Sarajevo, December 11, 2007: The President of the Olympic Committee of Bosnia and Herzegovina, Kvesic, recently said that Bosnia and Herzegovina is looking forward to the Beijing Winter Olympics, and believes that China has the ability to hold the Winter Olympics in a special period.

src: 日前中国驻波黑大使季平在萨拉热窝奥林匹克中心会见波黑奥委会主席克韦西奇。
new_mt: The Chinese Ambassador to Bosnia and Herzegovina, Zhang Qi, met with the President of the Olympic Committee of Bosnia and Herzegovina, Kvesic, in Sarajevo Olympic Center.

src: 会见时，克韦西奇积极评价波中关系并表示，他曾于2008年北京夏奥会之际访华，对中方出色的组织工作印象极为深刻，坚信中国有能力在特殊时期办好冬奥盛会；波方十分期待北京冬奥会，波黑奥委会正在积极组织参会；波方希望以此为契机，同中方在体育领域开展更为广泛的交流合作。
new_mt: When meeting, Kweisi Chi, the Chinese ambassador to Poland, actively evaluated the China-Poland relations and said that he had visited China in 2008 during the Beijing Olympic Games, and he had a deep impression on the excellent organization of the Chinese side. He believed that China had the ability to hold a good Winter Olympics in a special period. The Polish Olympic Committee is looking forward to the Beijing Winter Olympics, and the Polish Olympic Committee is actively organizing the participation. The Polish side hopes to use this opportunity to expand cooperation in sports with China.

src: 季平表示，中波两国有着特殊的“奥运纽带 ” 。
new_mt: The Chinese and Brazilian teams have a special "Olympic belt" relationship.

src: 1984年萨拉热窝冬奥会在这里成功举办，再过两个月，2022年北京冬奥会也将拉开帷幕，将向世界呈现一场简约、安全、精彩的盛会。
new_mt: The 1984 Sarajevo Winter Olympics were successfully held here, and two months later, the 2022 Beijing Winter Olympics will also be held here, and will present a simple, safe and spectacular show to the world.

src: 期待两国在冬季体育赛事筹备、运动员训练等方面深化交流合作，中国驻波黑使馆愿继续发挥桥梁作用，以北京冬奥会为契机，推动两国人文交流不断深化，让两国人民“一起向未来 ” ， 并祝波黑运动健儿在北京取得佳绩。
new_mt: The Chinese Embassy in Bosnia and Herzegovina wishes to see the cooperation between China and Bosnia and Herzegovina in winter sports events, training of athletes and other fields deepened, and the embassy will continue to play a bridge role. We hope that the Beijing Winter Olympics will provide a platform for the people of China and Bosnia and Herzegovina to get together and move forward together, and wish the athletes of Bosnia and Herzegovina good results in the Beijing Winter Olympics.

src: 新华社西宁12月11日电（记者骆晓飞、张宏祥）记者从青海省农业农村厅获悉，最新监测结果显示，青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量今年较上年增加0.71万吨,达到10.85万吨，与2002年保护初期相比，累计增长40余倍。
new_mt: Xinhua News Agency, December 11, 2003 (Reporter Luo Xiaofei, Zhang Hongxiang) Reporters from the Green Lake, Qinghai Province, learned from the Qinghai Provincial Department of Agriculture and Rural Affairs that the latest monitoring results showed that the resource reserves of the naked carp in Qinghai Lake had increased by 0.71 tons this year, reaching 10.85 tons, which was 40 times higher than that in 2002 when the protection was first started.

src: 青海湖裸鲤俗名“湟鱼 ” ， 是青海湖中特有的珍贵鱼种，对维系青海湖流域“水-鱼-鸟”生态链安全和生物多样性有着举足轻重的作用。
retrieved_src: 管理者规定，每个犯人负责养护一盆花和一条鱼。
retrieved_ref: The prison guards set the rule that each and every prisoner must be responsible for planting a pot of flower and raise a fish.
new_mt: The naked carp is a local specialty of Qinghai Lake. It is a rare fish species in Qinghai Lake. It plays an important role in maintaining the ecological balance of the “water-fish-bird” ecological chain in the Qinghai Lake region.

src: 20世纪六七十年代，受人为大量捕杀、裸鲤繁殖水域环境日益退化等因素影响，青海湖裸鲤数量锐减，2002年青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量仅为2592吨。
new_mt: In the 20th century, the massive killing and breeding of carp in the 1960s and 1970s, as well as the deterioration of the aquatic environment, led to a sharp decline in the number of carp in Qinghai Lake. In 2002, the resource reserve of Qinghai Lake carp was only 2592 tons.

src: 2004年在《中国物种红色名录》中青海湖裸鲤被列为濒危物种。

src: 从2003年起，青海省实施封湖育鱼，禁止任何单位、集体和个人到青海湖及湖区主要河流及支流捕捞裸鲤，禁止销售裸鲤及其制品。
retrieved_src: 管理者规定，每个犯人负责养护一盆花和一条鱼。
retrieved_ref: The prison guards set the rule that each and every prisoner must be responsible for planting a pot of flower and raise a fish.
new_mt: Since 2003, Qinghai Province has implemented the ban on fishing in Qinghai Lake and its main tributaries. No unit, group or individual is allowed to fish in Qinghai Lake and its main tributaries. No unit, group or individual is allowed to sell the fish and its products.

src: 与此同时，通过人工增殖放流以及清理青海湖主要入湖河流河道、设计科学合理的“过鱼通道”等措施持续加大保护力度，青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量逐年增加。
new_mt: At the same time, through artificial breeding and releasing, and by cleaning the main inlet rivers of the lake, designing scientifically reasonable "passageways" for fish, the protection of the resources of the naked carp in the lake has been continuously strengthened.

src: 青海省农业农村厅副厅长杨林介绍，截至目前，青海湖裸鲤已累计实施人工增殖放流近1.8亿尾，对青海湖裸鲤资源恢复的贡献率超过23 % 。
new_mt: The deputy director of the Department of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of Qinghai Province, Yang Lin, introduced that as of now, the artificial breeding and release of naked carp in Qinghai Lake has been implemented for 1.8 billion fish, which has made a great contribution to the recovery of the naked carp resources of Qinghai Lake.

src: 青海三江源地区是我国乃至亚洲重要的生态屏障和水源涵养区，而青海湖是控制西部荒漠化向东蔓延的天然屏障和生态功能区。

src: 为了保护三江源地区和青海湖水域生态环境、保护水生野生动物，维护青藏高原生物多样性，今年以来，青海先后发布长江、黄河、青海湖重点水域禁捕通告，构建起了“一江一河一湖”全面禁捕管理体系。

src: 新华社昆明12月12日电（记者林碧锋）为持续做好脱贫人口就业帮扶，巩固拓展脱贫攻坚成果，云南省日前出台促进乡村振兴乡村公益性岗位管理相关政策，助力全面推进乡村振兴。
new_mt: Xinhua News Agency Kunming December 12, 2012 (reporter Lin Bifeng) to continue to do well in poverty alleviation and employment of the population, consolidate and expand the poverty alleviation and development achievements, Yunnan Province recently issued to promote rural revitalization and rural public welfare-related policy, to help the full implementation of rural revitalization.

src: 云南省人社厅有关负责人介绍，目前，云南共开发44.83万个乡村公益性岗位，用于安置脱贫劳动力等农村困难群体就业，在帮助脱贫群众实现就业增收、巩固脱贫攻坚成果、有效提升乡村各项公共服务能力等方面发挥重要作用。
new_mt: The Department of Civil Affairs of Yunnan Province introduces the responsible person, at present, Yunnan has developed 44.83 million rural public welfare positions, which are used for the employment of poverty-stricken labor force and other rural difficult groups, and play an important role in helping poverty-stricken groups achieve employment income increase, consolidate poverty alleviation achievements, and effectively improve the public service capacity of rural areas.

src: 此次新规由云南人社、乡村振兴、财政等七部门联合印发，主要对基层招聘乡村公益性岗位人员的对象范围、资金管理、岗位开发、岗位管理等方面进行统一规范。
new_mt: This new regulation was jointly issued by the departments of Rural Revitalization, Human Resources and Social Security, Finance, and others in Yunnan Province, mainly to standardize the scope of recruitment of rural public welfare positions, the management of funds, the development of positions, and the management of positions.

src: 在岗位开发设置方面，新规明确，按照“按需设岗、以岗定人、动态管理、总量控制 ” “ 谁开发、谁使用、谁负责”及“一人一岗、自愿公开、统一管理”的原则进行设置。

src: 招聘程序必须按照公告、申报、审核、公示、聘用、岗前培训及安排上岗等步骤进行。

src: 此外，新规还明确了乡村公益性岗位主要开发部门的具体职责、乡村公益性岗位的补贴标准和补贴方式，规定各乡村公益性岗位开发部门应为乡村公益性岗位安置人员购买意外伤害商业保险；要求有关部门定期对乡村公益性岗位补贴发放情况进行监督。

src: 越南人民报网 - 越南政府总理范明正出席第三次越南国家数字技术企业发展论坛
new_mt: Vietnamese Prime Minister Phạm Minh Chính attends the third Vietnam Digital Technology Enterprise Development Forum

src: 第三次越南国家数字技术企业发展论坛期间举行两场主要会议，讨论议题围绕着数字技术企业与国家数字化转型、数字技术企业与新冠肺炎疫情中和疫情后经济复苏与发展两大主题。
new_mt: The third Vietnam Digital Technology Enterprise Development Forum was held in two sessions during the forum, discussing topics around digital technology enterprises and the digital transformation of the country, digital technology enterprises and the COVID-19 epidemic, and the post-epidemic economic recovery and development.

src: 通信传媒部部长阮孟雄表示，2021年，尽管新冠肺炎疫情持续蔓延，但越南数字技术企业的数量和营业收入仍保持增长势头，达近10 % 。
new_mt: The Minister of Information and Communications Nguyen Manh Hung said that in 2021, although the COVID-19 epidemic continued to spread, the number of digital technology enterprises in Vietnam and their revenue continued to grow, reaching nearly 10%.

src: 2021年，越南典型数字产品数量耕作，集中解决越南面临的各大难题，许多数字产品已走出国门，越南数字技术排名已提升。
retrieved_src: 第二轮的拨款项目，会包括长者牙齿健康教育活动项目，及其他培养长者生活兴趣，例如观星、有机耕作等项目，由平常较少接触长者事务的专业团体及兴趣组织提供。
retrieved_ref: In addition to dental care education programmes for elders,the second round will include programmes devoted to cultivating elders ' interest in leisure activities such as organic farming and stargazing. These programmes will be organized by professional bodies and interest groups which have hitherto little involvement with elderly affairs.
new_mt: In 2021, Vietnamese typical digital products have been widely used in the country, and many digital products have been exported abroad, and the ranking of Vietnamese digital technology has been improved.

src: 阮孟雄部长呼吁数字技术企业负起发展国家数字化转型平台的责任，担当发展这些国家数字平台的任务就是担当国家使命。
new_mt: The Minister of Industry and Information Technology, Mr. Miao Wei, called on digital technology enterprises to shoulder the responsibility of developing the country's digital transformation platform, and to take on the mission of developing these national digital platforms.

src: 在论坛上，各部门和国家机关领导，正在研究、发展、应用、转让数字技术的企业、组织和个人分享了动员和汇集全社会资源来发展越南技术企业，携手推动国家数字化转型，朱慧疫情后经济复苏等的各突破性设想和解决方案。
new_mt: In the forum, the leaders of the departments and the national authorities are studying, developing, applying and transferring digital technologies to the enterprises, organizations and individuals to mobilize and gather the resources of the whole society to develop Vietnamese technology enterprises, and to work together to promote the digital transformation of the country, to overcome the challenges after the epidemic of the economy and to revive.

src: 范明正总理在论坛上发表讲话时强调，数字化转型是世界必由之路，是发展的客观需求。
new_mt: The Prime Minister of China, Fan Mingzheng, emphasized in his speech at the forum that digital transformation is the inevitable path of the world, and the objective demand for development.

src: 数字化转型已成为全球性问题，数字化转型服务全民，因此需动员全民参与。
new_mt: Digital transformation has become a global issue, digital transformation services are for all people, therefore we need to mobilize all people to participate.

src: 人民和企业是数字化转型的核心、主体、目标和动力。
new_mt: The people and enterprises are the core, subject, target and driving force of digital transformation.

src: 因此，一切政策需为了人民和企业。
new_mt: Therefore, all policies should be for the people and enterprises.

src: 范明正总理强调，数字化转型需体现民族精神，需以内力为主、战略、长期和决定性因素，外力为重要和突破口。
new_mt: Premier Li Keqiang stressed that the digital transformation needs to reflect the national spirit, needs to be based on internal strength, with strategic, long-term and decisive factors, and external forces as important and breakthroughs.

src: 他同时认为，数字化转型需驱动向纵深发展和可持续发展，参与新冠肺炎疫情防控、经济复苏和发展、应对其后变化、克服自然资源枯竭现象，助力绿色转型、发展绿色能源。
new_mt: He also believes that digital transformation needs to drive horizontal and deep development and sustainable development, participate in the prevention and control of the new crown pneumonia epidemic, economic recovery and development, and deal with changes after the epidemic, overcome the problem of resource depletion, and help green development and green energy development.

src: 数字化转型需参与保护和弘扬有关国家文化价值、历史传统、国家风土人情等的数据库建立工作，推动银行、税务、土地管理和开发数据库以及物流等领域数字化转型。
new_mt: The digital transformation needs to involve the protection and promotion of the cultural values, traditions, and humanities of the country, as well as the establishment of databases for the protection of national cultural heritage, historical traditions, and national characteristics.

src: 数字化转型的最大目标是让人民更幸福，国家日益繁荣发展。
new_mt: The goal of digital transformation is to make people happier, and the country is developing more and more prosperous.

src: 范明正总理要求各级政府、各级机关和企业在发展数字技术中需加大领导和指导力度，提高对数字化转型的认识，继续制定和完善关于数字化转型的体制，加强国家管理度和本着尊重、沟通、倾听、积极和主动的精神上推动对数字技术企业发展。
new_mt: Premier Li Keqiang stressed that all levels of government, all levels of departments and enterprises should increase their leadership and guidance in developing digital technology, enhance their understanding of digital transformation, continue to formulate and improve the relevant systems, strengthen the management level of the country and promote the development of digital technology enterprises in a positive and proactive manner.

src: 论坛期间，范明正总理出席了2021年“越南制造”优秀数字产品奖颁奖仪式及“越南制造”数字产品展开幕式。
new_mt: During the forum, Prime Minister Phạm Minh Chính attended the 2021 Vietnam Digital Products Excellence Awards and the Opening Ceremony of the Vietnam Digital Products Exhibition.

new_mt: “智汇潇湘”2021中国国际轨道交通和装备制造产业人才峰会开幕 - 滚动新闻 - 湖南日报网 - 华声在线

src: 湖南日报12月10日讯（全媒体记者 周帙恒）9日 ， “ 智汇潇湘”2021中国国际轨道交通和装备制造产业人才峰会在株洲开幕。
new_mt: 12th December 2021, “China International Railway and Equipment Manufacturing Talent Summit” was held in Changsha, Hunan Province.

src: 省委常委、省委组织部部长王成出席启动仪式并讲话。
retrieved_src: 4月份，省委专门就此召开了常委议军会，重点研究了稳定国防动员机构问题。
retrieved_ref: In April,the provincial CPC committee standing committee held an ad hoc military affairs meeting to discuss issues concerning consolidation of national defense mobilization organs.
new_mt: The provincial CPC committee standing committee, the provincial CPC committee organization department director Wang Cheng attended the opening ceremony and delivered a speech.

src: 王成指出，举办人才峰会是贯彻落实中央人才工作会议和省第十二次党代会精神的重要举措，彰显了湖南重视人才、渴求人才、用好人才的真心诚意。
new_mt: Wang Chengzhi pointed out that the talent summit is an important measure to implement the spirit of the Central Talent Work Conference and the 12th Provincial Party Congress, and it fully demonstrates Hunan's determination to use talents, pursue talents, and love talents.

src: 湖南有识才爱才敬才的优良传统、助力人才发展的广阔平台、实现美好生活的环境条件，近年来深入实施人才引领发展战略，以芙蓉人才行动计划为牵引，构建起引育留用全链条人才工作格局，成为了人才成长成就的沃土、创新创业的热土、宜居宜业的乐土。
retrieved_src: 芙蓉山道亦于四月二、四、八及九日封闭。
retrieved_ref: Fu Yung Shan Road will also be closed on April 2,4,8 and 9.
new_mt: In Hunan, there are excellent traditional traditions, broad platforms for talent development, and favorable conditions for realizing a beautiful life. In recent years, we have deepened the implementation of the strategy of talent leading development, and the Fuyong Talent Action Plan has been used as a driving force to build a full-chain talent work system. It has become a fertile land for talent growth, a hotbed for innovation and entrepreneurship, and a pleasant land for living and working.

src: 当前，湖南正在全面落实“三高四新”战略定位和使命任务，将进一步广开引贤纳才之门，为人才创新创业出台更优政策、集中更多资源、创造更好条件，期待各界优秀人才共同为湖南高质量发展聚智汇力。
new_mt: At present, Hunan is fully implementing the strategic positioning and mission of "three highs and four new" and is striving to open the door to talents and attract talents. src: 新华社武汉12月11日电（记者王贤）重庆市涪陵水上绿色综合服务区10日如期建成投入运营，这是继8日四川省泸州水上绿色综合服务区挂牌运营后，长江上游正式运营的第2个水上绿色综合服务区。
new_mt: The Chongqing Municipal Government announced on December 11 that the Chongqing Waterfront Green Comprehensive Service Area in the Dazu District was officially put into operation on December 10. This is the second waterfront green comprehensive service area in the upper reaches of the Yangtze River after the Lushan Waterfront Green Comprehensive Service Area in the Eryuan District of Yunnan Province was officially put into operation on December 8.

src: 至此，水上绿色综合服务区已覆盖长江上、中、下游。

retrieved_ref: The issue that raised the most concern when working at the source of the Yangtze River was the environmental protection issue.
new_mt: After this, the water-based green comprehensive service area has covered the upper, middle and lower reaches of the Yangtze River.

src: 交通运输部长江航务管理局副局长邱健华介绍说，此前，湖北、湖南、江西、安徽、江苏等省份已在长江中游、下游建成运行10个水上绿色综合服务区，得到了广大船员的认可，为推进长江航运高质量发展发挥了重要作用。

src: 水上绿色综合服务区全覆盖是长江绿色航运建设的又一里程碑事件，长江船舶污染物接收、航运服务能力得到显著提升。

src: 省、自治区、直辖市公安机关消防机构为二级注册消防工程师资格的注册审批部门，并负责一级注册消防工程师资格注册的初步审查工作。
new_mt: The provincial public security fire brigade, the autonomous region, the direct-controlled city public security fire brigade is the second-level registration of fire engineering qualification registration review department, and is responsible for the initial review of the first-level registration of fire engineering qualification registration.

src: 第十九条 取得一级、二级注册消防工程师资格证书并申请注册的人员，应当受聘于一个经批准的消防技术服务机构或者消防安全重点单位，并通过聘用单位向本单位所在地(聘用单位属企业的，通过本企业向工商注册所在地)的公安机关消防机构提交注册申请材料。
new_mt: Article 19: Persons who have obtained the first-class and second-class registration certificates of fire engineering technicians and applied for registration shall be employed by a fire technology service organization or a fire safety key unit that has been approved by the competent authority.

src: 第二十条 省、自治区、直辖市公安机关消防机构在收到申请人的注册申请材料后，对申请材料不齐全或者不符合法定形式的，应当当场或者在5个工作日内，一次 性告知申请人需要补正的全部内容，逾期不告知的，自收到申请材料之日起即为受理。
new_mt: Article 20: The public security and fire departments of the provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities directly under the Central Government shall, within five working days of receiving the application materials from the applicant, notify the applicant of any deficiencies in the application materials or any deficiencies in the application materials that do not conform to the legal form, and shall notify the applicant of the deficiencies in the application materials within five working days of receiving the application materials. If the notification is not made within the prescribed time limit, the application materials shall be deemed to have been accepted.

src: 对受理或者不予受理的注册申请，均应当出具加盖本级公安机关消防机构专用印章和注明日期的书面凭证。
retrieved_src: 此外，多项服务标准亦已调高，项目包括柜位查询、处理利得税报税表、退还多缴税款、文件加盖印花及商业登记事宜。
retrieved_ref: The service standards in the areas of counter enquiries,processing of profits tax returns,refunds of tax arising from overpayment,document stamping and business registration matters have also been enhanced.
new_mt: For applications for registration which are accepted or not accepted, the relevant public security fire department should issue a certificate with the seal of the public security fire department and the date of issue.

src: 第二十一条 省、自治区、直辖市公安机关消防机构自受理注册申请之日起20个工作日内，按规定条件和程序完成一级注册消防工程师资格注册申请材料的初步审查工作和二级注册消防工程师资格的注册审批工作，并将一级注册消防工程师资格注册申请材料和初步审查意见报公安部消防局审批。
new_mt: Article 21: Within 20 working days from the date of receipt of the application for registration of the first-level registered fire engineers, the provincial public security organs, the autonomous region, the direct-controlled city fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the fire brigade, the

src: 公安部消防局应当自收到省级公安机关消防机构报送的申请材料和初步审查意见之日起，20个工作日内作出是否批准的决定。
new_mt: The fire department of the Ministry of Public Security should make a decision on whether to approve the application within 20 working days from the date of receipt of the application materials and the preliminary review opinions submitted by the provincial public security fire departments.

src: 在规定的期限内不能作出批准决定的，应当将延长的期限和理由告知申请人。
new_mt: The decision on the application should be made within the prescribed time limit. If it is not possible to make a decision within the prescribed time limit, the extension of the time limit and the reason should be notified to the applicant.

src: 对作出不予批准决定的，应当书面说明理由，并告知申请人享有依法申请行政复议或者提起行政诉讼的权利。
retrieved_src: 第六十五条信托监察人有权以自己的名义，为维护受益人的利益，提起诉讼或者实施其他法律行为。
retrieved_ref: Article 65. Trust controllers have the right to start legal proceedings or take the other legal actions in their names to safeguard the interests of the Beneficiary.
new_mt: If the decision is not approved, the reasons should be explained in writing and the applicant should be informed of the right to apply for administrative reconsideration or to bring an administrative lawsuit.

src: 第二十二条 注册审批部门应当自作出批准决定之日起10个工作日内，颁发、送达相应级别的注册证。
new_mt: Article 22: The registration approval department shall, within 10 working days from the date of approval, issue the registration certificate.

src: 第二十三条 注册证的每一注册有效期为3年。
new_mt: Article 23. The registration certificate is valid for 3 years.

src: 注册证在有效期内是相应级别注册消防工程师的执业凭证，由注册消防工程师本人保管、使用。
new_mt: The registration certificate is valid within the validity period of the corresponding level of registration of fire engineering technicians, and is the practicing certificate of fire engineering technicians.

src: 第二十四条 申请初始注册的，应当自取得一级、二级注册消防工程师资格证书之日起1年内提出申请。
new_mt: Article 24: The applicant for initial registration shall apply for registration within one year from the date of obtaining the first-class and second-class registration qualification certificate.

src: 逾期申请初始注册时，须符合本规定继续教育要求。
new_mt: When applying for initial registration, the applicant must meet the continuing education requirements.

src: 初始注册、延续注册、变更注册、注销注册和不予注册等注册管理的具体办法，由公安部另行规定。
new_mt: The specific measures for registration management, including initial registration, renewal registration, change registration, cancellation registration and non-registration, are formulated by the public security department.

src: 第二十五条 继续教育是注册消防工程师延续注册、重新注册和逾期初始注册的必备条件。
new_mt: Article 25 Continuing education is a necessary condition for the renewal of registration, re-registration and re-registration of registered fire engineers.

src: 在每个注册有效期内，各级别注册消防工程师应当按照规定完成相应的继续教育。
new_mt: During the validity period of each level of registration, the fire engineering technicians at each level should complete the corresponding continuing education in accordance with the regulations.

src: 第二十六条 注册审批部门应当及时向社会公告注册消防工程师注册有关情况，建立注册消防工程师诚信档案，对其执业活动实行信用管理。
new_mt: Article 26: The registration and approval department shall timely publicize the registration of fire engineering technicians, establish a credit record of fire engineering technicians, and implement credit management of their business activities.

src: 第二十七条 各级注册消防工程师资格的注册管理部门，应当严格执行《中华人民共和国行政许可法》有关规定。
new_mt: Article 27 Each level of the registration management department of the fire engineering technician qualification shall strictly implement the relevant provisions of the Administrative Licensing Law of the People's Republic of China.

src: 中越两军“和平救援-2021”卫勤联合演习圆满结束-新华网
new_mt: China-Vietnam Joint Military Drill “Peace and Friendship-2021” Concludes Successfully-Xinhua

src: 新华社河内12月12日电（周娜 滕怀金）12日上午，参加中越两军“和平救援-2021”卫勤联合演习的中方参演分队全部安全返回中国广西境内，标志着此次持续7天的演训任务顺利完成。
retrieved_src: 北京与河内于一九九四年结为友好城市。
retrieved_ref: Beijing and Hanoi formed friendship ties in 1994.
new_mt: 12/12/2021, 10:00 AM, Hanoi, Vietnam. The Chinese military medical team participating in the "Peace and Friendship-2021" joint exercise between the Chinese and Vietnamese armed forces has safely returned to China's Guangxi.

src: 此次联演，中越两军围绕人道主义医学救援这一重大课题，紧扣卫勤救死扶伤使命任务，按照实战化标准完成了联合卫勤指挥、联合现场救援、批量伤员处置等课目内容，有效提升了两军卫勤保障能力。
new_mt: This time, the joint exercise between the Chinese and Vietnamese armies focused on humanitarian medical rescue, and the two armies closely followed the mission of rescue, relief, and treatment of the wounded. According to the standard of real combat, the joint command of rescue, the joint rescue on the spot, and the mass treatment of the wounded were completed, effectively improving the joint rescue capabilities of the two armies.

src: 演习成果得到中越两军的肯定。
new_mt: The results of the joint exercises between the Chinese and Vietnamese armies have been recognized by both sides.

src: 越方演习指导委员会主任、越南人民军后勤总局副主任兼参谋长阮雄胜在演习结束仪式上说，通过此次演习，越南军医从中国军医身上学到了演习组织及专业活动方面的知识，也见识了中方的医疗、保障设备。
retrieved_src: ‘我们希望他们能在短暂的访问中广泛听到不同意见和见识不同事物。
retrieved_ref: We hope that they will hear as wide a range of views as is possible and see as much as they can within the limited time available.
new_mt: The Chairman of the Vietnamese Exercise Guidance Committee, the Vice-Minister of the Vietnamese People’s Army and the Deputy Chief of Staff of the Vietnamese People’s Army, Mr. Nguyen Xuan Son, said at the closing ceremony that the Vietnamese Army Medical Corps had learned a great deal about the organization and professional activities of the Chinese Army Medical Corps during the exercise. They had also gained a better understanding of the medical and protective equipment of the Chinese Army.

src: 演习取得的成果证明了两国军医力量在医疗援助、疫情防控方面的专业能力。
new_mt: The results obtained through the drill demonstrated the professional capabilities of the two countries in medical assistance and epidemic prevention and control.

src: 中方指导协调组组长、中央军委后勤保障部卫生局副局长陈春明表示，此次演习是在2018年成功举办联合义诊活动的基础上又一次开拓创新实践，具有非常重要的里程碑意义。
retrieved_src: 全国人大常委会副委员长、证券法执法检查组组长成思危主持会议并讲话。
retrieved_ref: Cheng Siwei,vice chairman of the NPC Standing Committee and head of the Inspection Team for the Enforcement of the Securities Law,presided over the meeting and made a speech.
new_mt: Chen Chunming, director of the Chinese Coordination and Guidance Group and deputy director of the Logistics Department of the Central Military Commission, said that this exercise is based on the successful holding of the joint medical mission in 2018 and is another innovative practice to open up new ground. It has a very important milestone significance.

src: 演习期间，中国人民解放军向越南人民军捐赠了医用防护口罩、医用防护服、快速核酸检测仪器等卫生防疫物资。
new_mt: During the training period, the Chinese People's Liberation Army donated medical protective masks, medical protective clothing, and rapid nucleic acid testing equipment to the Vietnamese People's Army.
